trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around April 11th 2011
Summary: large triangle passed over @ appox. 2,000', moving appox 200 mph traveling e to w
divs: Sighting Details I had just returned my mother to her home near Montgomery Texas . While waiting on my mother to locate her house keys, I looked up at the sky and saw a triangular object the size of a WAL MART store pass above. Moving from east to west, it make a very slight coarse correction directly over Wal Mart. Very faint white lights ran the length of the leading edge with brighter tip lights. This was a huge object, appearing to be black in color & moving silently. I was appox.3,000 ft or less from it and maybe 2,000 above me. It moved out of my line of sight in 30 seconds or so.
